name: Lifeboard
description: Demo:Master your Personal Productivity in one Dashboard.This life dashboard template is meant to be a map of your whole life in Notion. One dashboard creates an overview of all your projects, life areas, resources, goals, and life purpose.This is Different!This is not your usual self-improvement course. It's the personal life productivity system that you need for continuous progress in your projects, goals, knowledge expansion, and life purpose.What is the Lifeboard?The Lifeboard is a digital pr
features: Projects Database - to manage your projects; Areas Database - to oversee your life areas in mini-dashboards; Repertoire Database - to save your checklists and templates; Resources Database - to save your knowledge; Archives Database - to archive inactive items for later use; Goals Database - to keep track of your 1 year goals; Overview Database - to keep track of your long term vision; Northstar Database - to align your purpose, values and principles; Contacts Database - to keep track of people in your life; Milestones Database - to track your progress to your goals
